entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 04:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
